sentence: Now, the former president is currently supporting his former White House aide Max Miller in a House campaign even though Miller’s ex-girlfriend, fellow former White House staffer Stephanie Grisham, accused him of physically and emotionally abusing her.
author: Cameron Joseph
title: Trump endorsed a congressional candidate accused of abusing her stepdaughter.

sentence: +10 View gallery Stephanie Grisham considered warning Melania Trump about the 'unusual interest' President Donald Trump was taking in a young, attractive female staffer Grisham dated Max Miller, a Trump loyalist who is running for Congress in Ohio, but the two broke up.
title: Stephanie Grisham reveals her gay son said he was 'ashamed' she worked for Trump's White House

sentence: +6 View gallery Rep. Bob Gibbs, a pro-Trump Republican, has represented Ohio's 7th Congressional District since 2013 and has served in Congress since 2011 +6 View gallery Last month a newly-redrawn version of Ohio's district map made ex-Trump staffer Max Miller, who had been challenging anti-Trump Republican Rep. Anthony Gonzalez in the May 3 primary, switch to Gibbs' territory He thanked his supporters as well as family and friends, stating he was 'eternally grateful' for his time at the US Capitol.
author: Elizabeth Elkind
title: Republican Rep. Bob Gibbs announces he will RETIRE before the midterms and clears the way for Stephanie Grisham's Trump-backed ex-boyfriend to win the GOP primary

sentence: The six-term congressman’s abrupt retirement leaves former Trump aide Max Miller as the frontrunner to claim a seat in the Canton area and Akron suburbs that Trump would have carried 54-45.
title: bid after new map leaves him in tough primary vs.
